channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Operational Decision Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Operational Decision Management

item.title: CVE-2018-1821|2024-09-16T23:00:28.431Z -- ibm -- operational%20decision%20management
item.description: IBM Operational Decision Management 8.5, 8.6, 8.7, 8.8, and 8.9 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 150170.
